message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this great product to you. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I can see you're interested in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a fair price considering the quality and value it offers. What do you think?
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I think it's worth a bit more than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $102?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can meet you at $108, but I think that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $106?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, Bob. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
